questions.question: This term refers to the information about threats and threat actors that helps organizations understand and mitigate potential attacks.
This type of threat intelligence focuses on understanding the tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs) used by threat actors.
This framework is widely used for describing the behavior of cyber adversaries and their methods.
questions.answer: What is the MITRE ATT&CK framework?

questions.question: This type of threat intelligence involves analyzing data from various sources to identify patterns and trends in cyber threats.
This term refers to the practice of sharing threat intelligence information between organizations to improve overall security.
